sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. In a large bowl, combine chopped lettuce, sliced chicken, chopped eggs, crumbled bacon, diced avocado, diced tomato, and crumbled blue cheese. 2. In a small bowl, whisk together red wine vinegar, olive oil, dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing. 3. Drizzle dressing over the salad and toss to coat. 4. Serve immediately.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="American">c7495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd3</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Lettuce (4 cups, chopped), Chicken Breas</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Lunch">617596df9751021069a3b6fce053af66</meal_type> <name>Cobb Salad</name> <nutrition>Calories: 450, Protein: 30g, Fat: 30g, Carbs: 15g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Grill chicken. 2. Cook bacon. 3. Chop vegetables and eggs.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>bcac87979795021069a3b6fce053af9c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
